Translations.Text: allahana ayda dasara horatu
avara (ilyasara) nenapannu navu mundinavaralli ulisiruvevu
ilyas‌rige santi sigali
navu khandita sajjanarannu ide riti puraskarisutteve
avaru khandita nam'ma visvasi dasarallobbaragiddaru
innu lutaru khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
navu avarannu hagu avara maneyavarannella raksisidevu
hinde ulidukonda obba vrd'dheya horatu
(avara janangada) itararannu navu nasa madibittevu
nivantu avara (nadugala) melindale hadu hoguttiri – hagalalli –
mattu irulalli. Nivenu alocisuvudillave
yunus khandita nam'ma dutarallobbaragiddaru
avaru tam'ma tumbida hadaginedege dhavisidaru
(hadagu muluguva hantadalli) avaru (adrstada) citi ettuvudakke oppidaru mattu sotu hodaru
konege (samudrakkeseyalada) avarannu minu nungitu. Aga avaru tam'manne dusisikondaru
ondu vele avaru allahana pavitravannu japisuttiruvavaragade iddiddare
punarut'thanada dinadavaregu avaru adara (minina) hotteyalle uliyuttiddaru
konege navu avarannu bayalige esedu bittevu. Aga avaru tumba ksinaragiddaru
navu avara bali balligaliruva gidavannu belesidevu
mattu navu avarannu ondu laksa athava adakkinta heccu janariddallige kalisidevu
avaru (a nadinavaru) nambidaru mattu ondu nirdista kalada tanaka navu avarige dharala sampannate nididevu
Idiga avarodane keliri. Nim'ma odeyanige putriyaru mattu avarige putrare
navenu malak‌galannu striyaragi srstisiruveve? Adakkenu avaru saksigalagiddare
nimage tilidirali. Avaru khandita tave racisikonda sullugalannu heluttiddare
allahanige santatigaliddarendu (avaru heluttare). Avaru khandita sullu heluttiddare
avanenu putrariginta putriyarige prasastya nididane
nimagenagide? Nivu adentaha tirmanagalannu kaigolluttiri
